name: Resist Elements
description: As endure elements, except resist elements absorbs the first 12 points of damage. Note: Resist elements overlaps (and does not stack with) endure elements and protection from elements.  If a character is warded by protection from elements and one or both of the other spells, the protection spell absorbs damage until it is exhausted.  If a character is warded by resist elements and endure elements at the same time, the resist spell absorbs damage but the endure spell does not.
